mapper.sql: info_id, info_title, theme, content, thumb_image, views, comments, loves, create_time, is_top, info_type, user_id, origin_id, state, state_time
mapper.select: select info_id infoId, info_title infoTitle from information where origin_id=#{originId} and info_type=#{infoType} and state='A' order by create_time desc limit 0,#{infoNum}

SELECT info.info_id infoId, info.info_title infoTitle, info.content content, info.theme theme, info.thumb_image thumbImage, info.views views, info.comments comments, info.loves loves, info.create_time createTime, info.is_top isTop, info.origin_id originId, u.user_id userId, u.true_name trueName, u.is_admin isAdmin FROM information info, user u
info.user_id=u.user_id AND info.state=#{state} AND info.info_type=#{infoType} AND info.theme LIKE '%%' AND ( info.info_title LIKE #{queryStr} OR u.true_name LIKE #{queryStr} ) ORDER BY info.create_time desc, info.is_top desc

SELECT DISTINCT info.info_id infoId, info.info_title infoTitle, info.content content, info.theme theme, info.thumb_image thumbImage, info.views views, info.comments comments, info.loves loves, info.create_time createTime, info.is_top isTop, info.origin_id originId, u.user_id userId, u.true_name trueName, u.is_admin isAdmin, u.introduce introduce, img.image_path portrait FROM information info, user u, origin o, image img
info.info_id=#{infoId} AND info.user_id=u.user_id AND u.image_id=img.image_id AND info.state='A'
